title: Synthesis of azelaic acid copolyester plasticizers and their application in PVC
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23662-23671
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03174A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wanjing Zhang, Liyan Wang, Hong Chen, Liying Guo, Yaoyao Bai, Xin Qian
PHMAZ copolyester plasticizers with different contents of 2-methyl-1,3-propanediol were synthesized. PHMAZ-45 showed the most favorable plasticizing effect on PVC.
